lines.text: You, wanted to see me, Noah; is there some kind of, uh, problem?
Well, when you came aboard the ark without a lady crocodile, I was worried. But the Lord provided the answer.
Uh, what do you mean, mine? I got no time for a family. I'm gonna have too many responsibilities being King of the Beasts!
If you can't handle the burdens of fatherhood, why should we believe you'd make a good king? Think it over, friend!
Ohh, what am I gonna do? I gotta get rid of these things fast!
Noah must have some kind of trouble or he wouldn't want me to come back. But I'll never do it because I'm a loner.

I'm the king of the crocs/And I live on these rocks/I'm as happy and strong/And I get along, here's why/I crave my own crag/I don't need a flag, not me/I don't need anyone/I'm my own fun, you see/I'm a loner who has everything I'll ever need to survive/'Cause I get along just me, myself and I
